revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 73:;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Pausis, mother Tkames, drachmas 8;;Herakles, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Valerius, fatherless, mother Valeria, drachmas 4, obols 27;;Ammon, son of Apion (Apion, son of Ammon);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 14) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;and to Leonides, son of Apion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2;;eparourion obols 4.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obols 3.5;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3.5;;tax on land plots in release likewise obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 124 obols 7.;(Pauni) 5 likewise:;Phaesis, son of Heras, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Limnaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Phasis, son of Amphiomis (Pemes, son of Atai);;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 12) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2;;Anchophis, son of Petheus, grandson of Anchophis, mother Aphrodous, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Imouthes, son of Keras, grandson of Menadros, mother Tepheros, copper tetradrachma;;Ptolemaios, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 8;;Kastor, his son, mother Tapasion, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 48 obols 11.;(Pauni) 6 likewise:;Ptolemaios, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, copper tetradrachma;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sentis alias Theagenes, son of Petheus, grandson of Theagenes, mother Tauris, drachmas 12;;Horos, son of Onnophris, grandson of Harendotes, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, drachmas 4;;Valeria, daughter of Isias through the agency of Valeria, daughter of Herais (Esouris, son of Samels);;(in left margin: drachmas 36, obols 16) apomoira drachmas 15, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obol 0.5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 3 obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 10, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 3.5, in total drachmas 33 obols 4.5;;Athenion, son of Horos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Heras, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
